FuncDef: This command what string to put in the Calling Number AVP, for L2TP control messages related to a session in this L2TP protocol instance.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the L2TP calling number AVP. Values-ascii-spec|char-specification ascii-spec||, |char-specification|ascii-char | char-origin, |ascii-char |a printable ASCII character, |char-origin |%origin|, |origin | S | c | r | s | l|, ||S|system name, the value of TIMETRA-CHASSIS-MIB::tmnxChassisName, ||c|Agent Circuit Id, ||r|Agent Remote Id, ||s|SAP ID, formatted as a character string, ||l|Logical Line ID.
